title: Zero: Black Blood
resume: Ray Fujita stars as the lead character Rei Suzumura, the Silver Fanged Knight Zero, reprising his role as the character from the previous Garo television series and films. This series explores this character who served a supporting role in the previous productions and his investigation of a joint human and Horror commune led by the Horror Ring.
